message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"male student or boy","sentence":"男生在学校。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation of a cheerful young boy student standing in front of a simple school building, wearing a schoolbag. The background features soft, dreamy post-apocalyptic tones with subtle animated effects, but the boy looks happy and hopeful, emphasizing the school environment.","sentence_translation":"The boy student is at school."}
